title: C9 v GE
body: anyone watch this....can I even call it a game? Hai picking Kennen (last) into a Corki, Liss and LB?  How is he going to get in against those three that can dive away?!?  OMG this was so sad-not even how C9 normally plays, but maybe it is as of their performance this season...

replies.body: C9 just played GE's game. They didn't play their own game

^Was just looking for an appropiate way to sum it up

Completely destroyed in picks and bans. GE took away 4 of C9's champs and C9 didn't ban out the 2 cancers koreans abuse ( lee sin and leblanc)

> [{quoted}](name=Falcon 87,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=22n0NsoA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-13T12:59:36.155+0000)
>
> RIP NA.

LOL c9 is not even the best team NA right now. If that was CLG instead of c9 it would have been a better game. Maybe not a win but a better game.

seriously C9 lost the game before it had even started, if you listened to the desk they said

"At breakfast the c9 players were already talking about the fact that they were going to loose"

If you go into a Best of 1 match thinking that then its no wonder they lost.

The Kennen pick would of worked fine if they hadn't fed GE tigers hard early game with the uncharacteristic, and honestly idiotic aggressive play. The mid game team-fighting from C9 would of been much better than GE's.
C9 Just got schooled.  I think they want to go back to the comfort of there bubble back home in NA where they "look good".
